title: Medical Guardian Expands Leadership Team, Hires Sunil Vulli as Chief Technology Officer
text:
PHILADELPHIA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Medical Guardian announced that Sunil Vulli has joined the company’s leadership team as its first Chief Technology Officer (CTO). In this role, Sunil will lead the overall administration of company technology, including IT strategy, corporate objectives and day-to-day operation support.
“Capitalizing on advancements in technology is critical to improving support systems for the older adult community and continuing to improve our alert systems with innovations that best fit our customers’ lifestyles and needs,” said Geoff Gross, Founder & CEO of Medical Guardian. “Sunil’s extensive digital background and experience will be a huge asset as we continue to build upon our momentum and create a stronger link between the healthcare and technology industries.”
With more than 15 years of experience in lifestyle consumer products and technology, Sunil has a background in product innovation, continuity and CRM execution in health foods, personal care and the home security sector. Prior to joining Medical Guardian, Sunil led digital transformation as marketing and technology leader at Hihealth, LifeShield and Nutrisystem through their startup to growth phases. He has a strong understanding of maximizing both topline and bottom line growth, with strengths in both strategic data analysis and new product innovation.
“It’s an honor to join the nation’s leading provider of medical alert systems as its first CTO,” Sunil said. “I look forward to applying my technology expertise to innovation that will provide the best service and round the clock protection to older Americans.”
Whether it is a process detail or new concept in loT, Sunil will embrace big ideas, while also understanding that ultimate success depends on what is measurable in delivering the best customer experience. Sunil holds a Master’s Degree in Computer Science from St. Joseph’s University and is currently pursuing a Master’s Degree in Business Administration from Kellogg School of Management at Northwestern University. To learn more about Sunil and the leadership team, visit https://www.medicalguardian.com/leadership .
About Medical Guardian
Founded in 2005, Medical Guardian is a leading provider of innovative medical alert systems that empower people to live a life without limits. A member of the National Aging in Place Council, Medical Guardian is headquartered in Philadelphia and provides support to tens of thousands of people across the country who are ready to take on the next chapter of life while remaining safe living in their own home. Whether it’s an in-home system or a mobile device with GPS capabilities, Medical Guardian has the personal medical alert device to meet an array of needs and lifestyles. In 2017, the company made its fifth appearance on the annual Inc. 5000 list. Learn more about Medical Guardian by visiting www.medicalguardian.com , Facebook and Twitter .
